original_text: But he always went back to Ramah, where his home was, and there he also held court for Israel. And he built an altar there to the Lord.
korean_text: 라마로 돌아왔으니 이는 거기에 자기 집이 있음이니라 거기서도 이스라엘을 다스렸으며 또 거기에 여호와를 위하여 제단을 쌓았더라

sentences.original_text: But he always went back to Ramah
and there he also held court for Israel
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그곳에서 그는 이스라엘을 위해 재판도 했습니다

sentences.original_text: And he built an altar there
